document_data.name: Inshula sar Mashewe
document_data.mainbody: '''Inshula sar Mashewe''' and her sister [[Kwesi sar Mashewe]] were huntswomen and bounty hunters active in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Inshula was a tall and beautiful [[Tashlutan]] woman, just like her sister. However, despite her beauty, her steely gaze and muscular body betrayed her vocation and strength. Some compared her body language to that of a strung [[bow]], ready to shoot an [[arrow]] at any moment.
document_data.Possessions: Inshula sar Mashewe. She also carried a deck of cards which she consulted when seeking guidance from her deity – [[Savras]]. He wore a set of unique [[enchanted]] [[Inshula's armor|hides]] and ''[[Inshula's Preyhunter|Preyhunter]]'' [[crossbow]].
document_data.Relationships: Inshula spent most of her life traveling and hunting alongside her sister Kwesi. Her [[animal companion]] was a pitch-black fierce [[panther]] named [[Areghaeb]].
